table_of_contents.title: Why are secrets so popular?
Foreword / by Steven Arterburn
Let's talk about secrets!
Introduction / by Dr. Jill Hubbard
The top secrets young women keep
What secret are you hiding?
Secret #1: my family is messed up
Secret #2: I hang out with people I shouldn't
Secret #3: I hate the way I look
Secret #4: I'm a couch potato too much of the time
Secret #5: I think I'm better than others
Why it feels so good (but hurts so bad) to keep your secret
Secret #6: I just want to be popular
Secret #7: I listen to music my parents absolutely hate (and I think God would hate it too)
Secret #8: sometimes I feel really depressed
Secret #9: I don't like myself and think others are better than I am
Secret #10: I ignore God
You can't trust everyone, but you can trust someone
Secret #11: my money trouble out-of-control spending
Secret #12: I know this sounds crazy but it feels good when I cut myself
Secret #13: If I were thin I'd be happier and more like ...
secret #14: I don't know what I believe about God
Secret #15: sometimes I want to kill myself
How to stop hiding your secret (and why that's a good thing)
Secret #16: I desperately want to be loved
Secret #17: someone has hurt me physically
Secret #18: someone has hurt me sexually
Secret #19: I'm pregnant
Secret #20: I have no idea what I want to do in life
You've told your secret now what happens?
Secret #21: I smoke, I do drugs, I get drunk (or I'm tempted to)
Secret #22: I have a hard time saying no to my friends (even when I don't want to say yes)
Secret #23: sometimes I think dirty thoughts (and sometimes I act on those thoughts)
Secret #24: I was raped
Secret #25: will the real me please stand up?
No more secrets, hello to the new you!

title: Secrets young women keep
by_statement: by Jill Hubbard, with Ginny McCabe ; foreword by Steven Arterburn.
